SESSION_ID.description: The session string used to authenticate the bot with WhatsApp. Must begin with 'XPLOADER-BOT:~' or 'CYPHER-X:~'.

BOT_NAME.description: Enter your bot name here (CypherX is cool, but feel free to name it something quirky!)

OWNER_NUMBER.description: The display name of the bot as it will appear in interactions.

OWNER_NAME.description: The primary owner's WhatsApp number, including country code (e.g., 2547XXXXXXXX).

TIMEZONE.description: Timezone for the bot's internal clock (e.g., Africa/Nairobi). Used for time-based functions. Don't change or Google if you don't know!
